mapper.select: select did, dtitle,dplace, dprice,to_char(dprice,'999,999') dpricech ,dinformation,dtime,dtarget,dnum,dfile,dsfile,dstart,dend,TRUNC(TO_DATE(dend, 'YY-MM-DD') - SYSDATE)+1 ENDDATE,dentertime,dcode,dtitle2 from dmu_ticket where did=#{did}

select dt.dtitle,dt.dplace, to_char(dt.dprice,'999,999') dpricech ,dr.rdate, to_char(dr.rdate, 'YY-MM-DD') rdateda ,dr.RTOTAL, to_char(dr.rallprice,'999,999') rallpricech from dmu_ticket DT , dmu_reservation DR where dt.did = dr.did and dr.rid= (select rid from (select rid from dmu_reservation order by rokdate desc) where rownum = 1)

select dt.dsfile, dt.dtitle, dt.dplace, dr.rid,dr.rdate, to_char(dr.rdate, 'YY-MM-DD') rdateda, dr.rtotal,to_char(dr.rallprice,'999,999') rallpricech, dm.mname, dt.dcode from dmu_ticket DT, dmu_reservation DR, dmu_member DM where dm.mid = dr.mid and dt.did = dr.did and dr.rid= (select rid from (select rid from dmu_reservation order by rokdate desc) where rownum = 1)
